sentences.en: Champenois wines can be particularly fragrant and perfumed.
sentences.cn: 香槟酒的香味会特别浓郁。
咖啡是一种香味浓郁的饮料.

sentences.en: Her name is fragrant with good deeds.
sentences.cn: 她因做好事而芳名流传.

sentences.en: It leaves your hair smelling deliciously fresh and fragrant.
sentences.cn: 它会让头发闻起来清新、芳香，令人愉悦。

sentences.en: It was a day in late September, as fragrant and shapely as an apple.
sentences.cn: 时令是九月末.这一天就像一只萍果那样香甜漂亮.

sentences.en: That lovely, rich fragrant smell of the forest enveloped us.
sentences.cn: 森林里那种馥郁芬芳的迷人气味围绕着我们。

sentences.en: The air was fragrant with lavender.
The air was fragrant with scents from the sea and the hills.
sentences.cn: 空气中荡漾着山和海的芬芳气息。

sentences.en: The air was fragrant with the smell of orange blossoms.
sentences.cn: 空气里弥漫着橘子花的香气。

sentences.en: The cake baking in the oven made the whole house fragrant.
sentences.cn: 炉上烤的蛋糕使满屋子气味喷香.

sentences.en: The Fragrant Hills are exceptionally beautiful in late autumn.
The grass was dewy, the apples green and raw, but already fragrant.
sentences.cn: 绿油油的草上沾着露珠, 苹果又绿又生, 不过已经芳香扑鼻.

sentences.en: The smallest, the most fragrant blossoms bedecked the girls.
sentences.cn: 那些最小最香的花朵都装饰在姑娘们身上.

sentences.en: Two large orange trees, now fragrant with blossoms, threw a delicious shade.
sentences.cn: 两棵芳香扑鼻的大桔子树, 绿叶成荫, 给人以爽凉之感.

trans.tran_cn: 芳香的，香的，愉快的，喷香，芳菲
